name: One Piece: Unlimited Cruise 2: Awakening of a Hero
name_original: One Piece: Unlimited Cruise 2: Awakening of a Hero
description:
Join The Straw Hat Pirates In An Exclusive Adventure And Sail Over The Thousand Seas To Reach Mysterious Islands!

  • With the participation of Eiichiro Oda
  • Play 12 characters and face the latest enemies from the manga
  • Various adventure/fight game modes
